name: Turret Trouble
description:
GioMade Inc. and Alexander Radchuk bring you Turret Trouble! 

Turret Trouble is a 3d Low Poly game that implements an endless wave-based mechanic. Survive through waves of cubes, larger cubes, and exploding cubes, all attempting to dismantle your turret! The game features 3 power ups, Freeze, Fast Fire, and Light Repair. These, coupled with infinite ammo and 360 degrees of rotation, make for a challenging last stand.  How long will you last?
